subtitle: This baked dessert dish is simply delicious.

method.text: Place the lasagne in a large pan of boiling water. Return to the boil then simmer for 5-8 min until just tender. Drain well and leave to cool, separating one sheet from one another to prevent them sticking together.
Place the apple rings, apricots and orange juice in a small pan. Bring to the boil then simmer for 5 min or until all the juice is absorbed. Leave to cool slightly.
Stir the almonds and half the orange rind into the custard. Roughly chop the apple and apricots then stir into the custard.
Arrange layers of the custard, lasagne and orange segments in a lightly greased rectangular ovenproof dish, finishing with the orange layer. Spoon the cream over the top.
Bake in the oven for 20 min.
Remove from oven, scatter the almonds over the top, and cook for about 5 min until lightly browned.
Serve immediately, decorated with a sprinkling of the reserved orange rind.

title: Fruity almond lasagne
